N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 383-5.2 - Application requirements

State Regulations

No later than 180 days before the end of the post-closure
period, the permittee must submit an application to modify the permit to
authorize institutional control. If the permittee is not the site owner, the
permittee must at the same time apply for a permit modification to transfer the
permit to the custodial agency. The custodial agency will be the permittee
during the institutional control period. Notes
